title: LLM Monitor (Search & Brand Analysis)
description: Generate or use seed commercial prompts, optionally expand competitor brands, and run them across multiple LLM models (with optional live search) to analyse brand presence and rankings.

models.title: LLM Models
models.description: List of LLM provider/model identifiers to evaluate. If empty, sensible defaults are used (openai/gpt-4.1, google/gemini-2.5-flash). Format: provider/model (e.g., openai/gpt-4.1, google/gemini-2.5-flash).

prompts_seed.title: Seed Prompts
prompts_seed.description: Optional list of seed prompts/questions to analyse directly. At least one of: seed prompts, sector, or seed brands must be provided so that the system can build a prompt list.
prefill: best insurance for freelancers in spain
compare small business liability coverage options

prompts_max.title: Max Prompts
prompts_max.description: Maximum total number of prompts after generation + seeds. Additional prompts are LLM-generated if seeds < this limit and sector or brands context is available.

prompts_language.title: Prompt Language
prompts_language.description: Language to use when generating additional prompts (e.g., English, Spanish).

brands_seed.title: Seed Brands / URLs
brands_seed.description: List of known brand names or homepage URLs to seed competitor expansion and brand rank analysis. Either brand names (e.g., 'mapfre') or URLs (https://www.mapfre.es).

brands_max.title: Max Competitor Brands
brands_max.description: Maximum number of competitor brands to identify via LLM + live search (in addition to any seed brands).

brands_model.title: Competitor Discovery Model
brands_model.description: LLM model used specifically for discovering competitor brands using search.

brands_in_prompt.title: Include Brands In Generated Prompts
brands_in_prompt.description: Whether generated prompts explicitly mention brand names: never (default), sometimes, or always.

sector.title: Sector
sector.description: Industry / sector context (e.g., insurance, banking, ecommerce). Helps prompt generation and competitor discovery.

market.title: Market
market.description: Geographic market focus (e.g., Spain, Germany, US). Used for competitor search and localized prompt generation.

use_search.title: Enable Live Search
use_search.description: If true, uses live search augmentation when querying models and for competitor discovery, enabling brand mention ranking.
